name: Blockchain & Wallet Projects
description: Built simple blockchains and wallet demos with Solidity and Foundry. Exploring on-chain patterns, smart contract development, and DApp architecture.

name: AI Voice Ordering System
description: Voice-driven ordering and reservation product. Natural language input, intent recognition, and real-time order flow for food service scenarios.

name: Food Delivery Platform
description: Migrated monolith to 60+ microservices. Designed coupon engine, membership system, pricing engine, and global integrations with 7-Eleven, Toast, Stripe, DoorDash.

name: Distributed Tracing Stack
description: Built full observability platform with SkyWalking, Zipkin, and OpenTelemetry. Custom JavaAgent instrumentation via ByteBuddy. Contributed plugins upstream to Apache SkyWalking.
